about_the_game:
DLC1 Contents:
• Additional missions
Area Missions: 13
Onboard Missions: 17
• Additional playable units
Hi-Nu Gundam
Voltes V
Type-2 Kobu Ogami Type
Type-2 Kobu Sakura Type
Kobu F2 Erica Type
STAR V (Fujiyama STAR)
STAR V (Rodeo STAR)
RyuKoOh/KoRyuOh
*You can acquire each unit by clearing the additional area missions.

Mobile Suit Gundam Char's Counterattack Beltorchika's Children
Super Electromagnetic Machine Voltes V
Sakura Wars series
Super Robot Wars OG series

*There is also a Season Pass that includes DLC2 and a special bonus, as well as Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition that includes the full game and Season Pass. Please be aware of duplicate purchases.

Mobile Suit Gundam Char's Counterattack Beltorchika's Children
Super Electromagnetic Machine Voltes V
Sakura Wars series

*There is also a Season Pass that includes DLC2 and a special bonus, as well as Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition that includes the full game and Season Pass. Please be aware of duplicate purchases.

name: Super Robot Wars 30 - DLC1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 320, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6670, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 | AMD Phenom II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9800 GTX, 512 MB | AMD Radeon HD 4870, 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

esrb.descriptors:
May contain content inappropriate for children

Visit www.esrb.org for rating information

short_description: DLC1 includes 9 additional playable units and 13 additional missions.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
